00014 #include "XPathMultiExpression.h"
00015 
00016 #include "boost/lexical_cast.hpp"
00017 #include <vector>
00018 
00019 namespace XMLTool {
00020 
00021 namespace XPath {
00022 
00028 template <typename T>
00029 class Assigner: public MultiExpression::NodeEvaluator {
00030 public:
00031    Assigner( T& val ):m_value( val ) { }
00032    virtual ~Assigner() {
00033    }
00034    inline void operator() ( const DOMNode* node ) try {
00035       assign( XMLUtility::getChildTextStr( *node ) );
00036    } catch ( const boost::bad_lexical_cast& e ) {
00037       mc2log << warn 
00038              << e.what()
00039              << ". Node name \""
00040              << XMLUtility::transcodefrom( node ? 
00041                                            node->getNodeName() : X("") )
00042              << "\"" << endl;
00043    }
00044 
00045    void assign( const MC2String& strVal ) {
00046       m_value = boost::lexical_cast<T>( strVal );
00047    } 
00048 
00049    void setValue( const T& value ) {
00050       m_value = value;
00051    }
00052 private:
00053    T& m_value;
00054 };
00055 
00057 template <>
00058 inline void Assigner< bool >::operator() ( const DOMNode* node ) {
00059    MC2String str = XMLUtility::getChildTextStr( *node );
00060    if ( strcasecmp( str.c_str(), "true" ) == 0 ||
00061         str == "1" ) {
00062       m_value = true;
00063    } else {
00064       m_value = false;
00065    }
00066 }
00067 
00069 template <typename T>
00070 Assigner<T>* makeAssigner( T& value ) {
00071    return new Assigner<T>( value );
00072 }
00073 
00078 template <typename T >
00079 class VectorAssigner: public MultiExpression::NodeEvaluator {
00080 public:
00081    typedef typename std::vector<T> Vector;
00082    explicit VectorAssigner( Vector& val ):m_value( val ) { }
00083    virtual ~VectorAssigner() {
00084    }
00085    void operator() ( const DOMNode* node ) {
00086       assign( XMLUtility::getChildTextStr( *node ) );
00087    }
00088 
00089    void assign( const MC2String& strVal ) {
00090       T value;
00091       Assigner<T> helper( value );
00092       helper.assign( strVal );
00093       m_value.push_back( value );
00094    }
00095 
00096 private:
00097    Vector& m_value;
00098 };
00099 
00100 template <typename T>
00101 VectorAssigner<T>* makeAssigner( typename std::vector<T>& value ) {
00102    return new VectorAssigner<T>( value );
00103 }
